info.description: API Endpoints for car wash app
info.title: # Car Wash System

post.description: Log in a user with email and password
Register a new user with an email and password
Create a new booking with the given details
Retrieve a list of bookings with optional filtering

get.description: Retrieve booking details by its ID

put.description: Update the details of a booking by its ID

delete.description: Delete a booking by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of payments with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new payment with the given details

get.description: Retrieve payment details by its ID

post.description: Register a new provider with the given details
Search for providers based on filters such as name, average rating, and creation date

get.description: Retrieve a list of reviews with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new review with the given details

put.description: Update the details of a review by its ID

delete.description: Delete a review by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all services with pagination

post.description: Create a new service in the system

get.description: Retrieve a service by its ID
get.summary: Get a specific service by ID

put.description: Update the details of a service by its ID
put.summary: Update a specific service by ID

delete.description: Delete a service from the system by its ID
delete.summary: Delete a specific service by ID

get.summary: get users by page and limit
Get a user by their id

delete.summary: Delete a user by their id
